name: Stacey Hensley
text: Had a great experience with the staff at Kentons Pizza Hut! It was our sons 15th birthday and he picked to go there to celebrate :) Great food and service. Thanks again Robin!

name: craig hurley
text: Good price.  Large pizza deal.

name: Jacob Honaker
text: I absolutely love going to the Kenton store. I even travel 20 minutes to get there. They treat u with respect and are always nice

name: sprepre noob
text: Lol pizza is ultimate

name: Robin Mathys
text: Pizza was very good. Waitress was great

name: Adam Totten
text: Ordered Garlic Parm wings and got wings with no sauce at all.  The cheesy bread sticks were cold.  Not very good.

name: aaron carroll
text: I placed an order online and my card was charged but my order was never placed never got my food and lost 50 dollars

name: Michael Wakely
text: It was good food. As of writing no simple salads because of covid.

name: Debra Ohler
text: Got cheesy bread sticks. Love them !!

name: harry puckett
text: One elderly server was having a hard time keeping up but did.shame on the management for allowing this.food was great.

name: Jenny Strickland
text: Food buffet was great! The food was fresh and hot, with choices. My son got the chicken wings that were really good. We also love how their pop taste. After my son went to get some gum balls, he got 2 blues. I guess when you get blue, you get free pizza coupons! So he got 2!

name: Beckie Vajen
text: Need to turn on lights when dark out. Drive passed it, doesn't help that it's in an old Buger King Restaurant. Food was good.

name: Tye Hurt
text: This place has great customer service who has changed my mind about never going back there after a mistake was made not only have the corrected the mistake but also kept me as a customer

name: Kevin Roberts
text: One of few pizza huts that still do the lunch buffet.   Marysville is other one.  Clean store, friendly staff, pizza not burned, and always supplied.  I do wish the salad bar had tomatoes tho.  Still,  buffet and water just shy of $7....GREAT deal :)

name: Justin Long
text: The food is always fresh and tastes fine. However sometimes the staff can make it seem like you are a hindrance on their day. But for the most part, I enjoy it

name: DaninWes Purcell
text: Food and service was great ! The only reason I didn't give 5 starts is because it wasn't very clean. The floor was a mess and when we went to the front to pay the back didn't look to good either.

name: Linda Williams
text: Love their pizza, usually good, but was a little slim on toppings. Ordered a mushroom and ham pizza. One piece only had a very small piece of ham and few mushrooms. Others pieces only slightly better. Usually it's a little better than that.

name: Jayme Morris
text: Kenton pizza hut would do better having bar open all the time

name: Katelyn Smith
text: Friendly staff, good atmosphere

name: john rose
text: Good service

name: Dave Matson
text: Excellent across the board. Would recommend it ,if in the Kenton area

name: Joshua Davis
text: We eat here almost every week, this is one of them better pizza huts.

name: C
text: Service was good. Food was okay. Called in my order just to reach someone who sounded like a call center that placed my order for me, which I found odd.

name: Gayle Ward
text: It was very good!

name: Terry Sneary
text: It's good. Restaurant clean and staff friendly but it's still pizza hit. Good for a quick lunch but certainly not the best pizza in the world.

name: Dave Perkins
text: Great people and food,one of the best places to eat in Kenton

name: Ash W.
text: I miss the waffle cheese fries that were there when we first moved to Kenton. I wish they hadn't taken them away! Jen Brunk often works there as a driver/delivery and she is the best they have!

name: Rebecca Buxton
text: Menu has changed big time! Lots less to choose from.

name: David Ramsey
text: Good food and fast service.

name: Darrin Musselman
text: Good pizza and have good timing on pickup order's

name: tiffany harsh
text: Great service

name: Amanda Jones
text: This visit was pretty bad. The tomatoes were hard, the olives were sour and the garlic dipping sauce was rancid. Not happy at all.

name: Phyllis George
text: Food was great. Service was excellent!

name: j jones
text: It's fine for fast food pizza. Not your local pizza place though.

name: MsCzimmerman
text: Service is always iffy. Pizza is good but for dine in sometimes the waitresses are great and other times not so much.

name: John Johnston
text: Great service, clean,nice atmosphere, great pizza.

name: Brian Howard
text: Always good! Great service!

name: Kyle G.
text:
It has been a long while since I have ate at a Pizza Hut and I must admit I was thoroughly impressed.  I tried a hand tossed, which was cooked perfectly; The crust crispy and not soggy, which has been hard to come by lately.
A+ for this paticular establishment

name: Brittany Roach
text: staff was friendly and food was yummy!

name: Devin Fay
text: Good service

name: Daniel Bowersmith
text: Friendly service..clean and good food..

name: Lois Lowew
text: Love my Pizza Hut breadsticks with their cheese sauce ,that's my favorite from there. And I if I order the pizza it's got to be the single supreme pizza. I just love it❤

name: George Shamblin
text: Good food and fast service.

name: Linda Strong
text: Pizza was very good and iced beer glass was delicious

name: Grandma B
text: Very good. Fast service

name: Jordan Ramge
text: Amazing pizza and atmosphere with friendly family like service.

name: Silver Fox
text: I never went inside I just drove by lol

name: Steven Feasel
text: I was not happy with the beginning of service the floor was really dirty the table we got was dirty and I believe that the managers seated us there then gave a young lady our table for her to wait on this she was really good the food was …More

name: Josh Gillfillan
text: Service is good and workers are very polite but the food taste generic.  No seasoning especially the pasta.  Very bland.

name: Josh morris
text: Food is better when you order and pick up

name: Caitlin Miller
text: The stand they have at the fair is usually good but I got food poisoning last night from their cheese bread sticks. Definitely not going back there.

name: Hunter Shelt
text: I love the pizza and buffet and everything about the place

name: Nora Sayre
text: Love it, eat there every wednesday

name: Kathy Ansley
text: Really hit the spot on a long hard day! Left over for breakfast!

name: Carol Moyer
text: Great food & service was very good!. Menu is somewhat limited

name: Beverly Foos
text: Waitress was great, seems to be getting pretty expensive though...

name: Jackie Shaw
text: Waitied to long for food and the forgot some  of our food,

name: danzig Thiel Thiel
text: Love thier pizz

name: Jeffrey Pifer
text: Best pizza hut in this part of the state. Excellent service very respectful employees.

name: Connie biddinger
text: That day not good

name: Amanda Kalb

name: john allison
text: Chicken Alfredo is really good pizza is always good too and the staff is friendly and willing to work with a complicated order

name: Austin Biederman
text: Bone-in wings really suck. But I do say they good on there boneless wings. Sometimes they can be rude on the phone but all in all not a bad place

name: Lori Clark
text: We had gotten there before the dinner rush. I had asked about the rewards program and no one knew anything about it. Even though there's a sign on the podium as you enter.

name: Troy Ramsey
text: Buffet day.  Pizzas good with great variety of pizzas.

text: End of long Labor day and they we're out of mushrooms, Italian Sausage. So the pizza wasn't as good as usual

name: Nexus A
text: My girlfriends and I come to this Pizza Hut regularly and love it each time. Our normal waitress, Brandy, is excellent.
